All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmericanSize
Represents American clothing sizes.
App
Entry point of the Clothes application.
Clothes
Represents a piece of clothing with basic attributes such as color, type, European size, and American size.
ClothesFactory
Factory class for creating Clothes objects via console input.
ClothesService
Service class responsible for managing and searching Clothes objects.
ClothesType
Represents different types of clothes.
CreateController
Controller responsible for creating Clothes objects based on user input.
CreateView
Console view responsible for displaying the clothes creation menu.
Deserializer
Utility class for deserializing objects from files.
Hat
Represents a Hat item.
HatType
Represents types of hat
MainController
Main application controller.
MainView
Console view responsible for displaying the main application menu.
Pants
Represents a Pants item.
SearchController
Controller responsible for searching and filtering Clothes.
SearchView
Console view responsible for displaying the search menu.
Serializer
Utility class for serializing objects to files.
Shirt
Represents a Shirt item.
Skirt
Represents a Skirt item.
SkirtLength
Represents different lengths of skirts.
SleeveLength
Represents sleeve length for shirts
View
Represents a generic view in the console-based application.
